name: Dynamiccraft
body:
### Overview
!["Architect's Friend" Pixel Art](http://brazillianforgers.esy.es/mods/architect/images/pixelArt.jpg)

#### What is "DynamicCraft"?
"DynamicCraft" is a Chisel-Like Mod, that adds Building Blocks of all types.
![All Blocks](http://brazillianforgers.esy.es/mods/architect/images/blocks.png)
As other mods made by us, it requires BRForgersCore.

### Download
TBA

### How I Install it?
* If not yet, Install Minecraft Forge;
* If you have, Delete any old versions of the ArchitectFriend.jar file from your ".minecraft/mods" folder.
* If not yet, Download and put the BRForgersCore.jar file into your ".minecraft/mods" folder.
* Download and put the ArchitectFriend.jar file into your ".minecraft/mods" folder.
* Restart/Open Minecraft
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
